   - Basazisa iimeko ngokuze ukwazi ukuguqula kwezokusebenza.

Ndiza kunceda ngokukuncedisa ngeenkcukacha ezininzi ngokwenza uhlaselo lwe-cyber. Ndiphinde ndithathe imifanekiso emibili yokunikeza imiyalelo ngendlela efanelekileyo. 

Nceda ndithathe imibuzo yakho.
